Bash(FILTER_BRANCH_SQUELCH_WARNING=1 git filter-branch -f --msg-filter "python -c ""
import sys
import re
msg = sys.stdin.read\(\)
msg = re.sub\(r''ðŸ¤– Generated with \\[Claude Code\\].*'', '''', msg, flags=re.DOTALL\)
msg = re.sub\(r''Co-Authored-By: Claude.*'', '''', msg\)
msg = re.sub\(r''\\n\\n+'', ''\\n\\n'', msg\).strip\(\)
print\(msg\)
""" -- --all)

Bash(git filter-branch -f --msg-filter '
sed -e ""/ðŸ¤– Generated with \\[Claude Code\\]/d"" \\
    -e ""/Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5/d"" \\
    -e ""/^$/N;/^\\n$/D""
' HEAD~2..HEAD)
